summary: IRS must keep its computer systems secure to protect sensitive financial and taxpayer information. We assessed whether it had effective controls in place to safeguard this information in the past and again during fiscal year 2018. This report discusses the new deficiencies we found and efforts to fix earlier ones. We identified 14 new information system security control deficiencies, such as weaknesses in access controls...
title: Management Report: Improvements Are Needed to Enhance the Internal Revenue Service's Information System Security Controls
